title: 請大家幫幫手寫封英文信

replies.msg:
Subject: Save HK, Go on a strike on 5/8(Mon)!

Dear valuable clients,

Hong Kong has suffered severely for several painful weeks. Hongkongers have tried their best to voice their views on the extradition law. They are unarmed citizens who truly love HK. However, the government responds with excessive police force and provoking lies. The police even cooperate with the triad society to attack innocent passengers in Yuen Long Station. Over the weeks, all the Hongkongers are heartbroken. On the fifth of August (Monday), Hongkongers will go on a strike to express our views to the government. We hope the government can treat our views seriously. We, Hongkongers, sincerely need you to join us, on the strike day.
You’re one of us!

Be strong and keep fighting!
Hongkongers
